website_summaries.verdict: The LG Tone Studio is a poorly conceived idea that combines wireless earphones with a personal speaker, and neither option sounds very good.
pros: Functions as both earphones and a speaker
cons: Personal speaker can perturb people around you
Mediocre sound quality from both speaker and earphones

customer_reviews.title: Overall Great Product, LG Missed The Mark On A Few Things
customer_reviews.text: I love these because of the speaker functionality but having had 2 previous Tone versions, the sound on the Infinims is still the best. I also feel like the volume doesn't go high enough sometimes, especially in speaker mode. The surround sound can be amazing, but it all depends on what you're listening to. Much less fragile than previous versions (no hanging wires or jointed band design, which is what caused by Infinims to fall apart). A bit bulky but not really that noticeable in my opinion. Overall, great product but they by far aren't the amazing sound of the Infinims on in-ear mode.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. P Enterprises

customer_reviews.title: Poor sound quality.  Cheap feel.
customer_reviews.text: Despite the names, logos, labels, and descriptions that describe this as their top-of-the-line premium model, I am disappointed. The ambient sound from the DTS speakers is tinny and flat. The downward rumble of the bass speakers is barely/intermittently noticeable, at best. When using it on phone calls, it's a 50/50 chance that the person I'm talking to will complain of a bad echo which only goes away if I put in the right earphone instead. The bluetooth range is pretty decent and once I memorized the position of the no-look switches, it got fairly easy to operate. All things considered, though, this does not feel like a premium product at all.
customer_reviews.author: world_wide_wes

customer_reviews.title: Have you seen these ear buds.. I mean.. speakers.. uh.. ear buds?!
customer_reviews.text: Have you seen these ear buds.. I mean.. speakers.. uh.. ear buds?! Switch from ear buds to speakers with no problems. Speakers are loud enough to hear but not loud enough for the person talking to you to know you're ignoring them! Great for when you work somewhere that has a no earbud policy but you still don't want to listen to coworkers! Hey.. it's not inside your ear.. and you can still hear everything going on around you! HA!
customer_reviews.author: D Dennison

customer_reviews.title: Best thing since the slice bread.
customer_reviews.text: The sound coming out of this thing is superb. Sounds clearer and cleaner than 99% of bluetooth headsets. Sound like it is wired. Bass is deep and tight, crisp mids, and clear highs. Would buy a second one.
customer_reviews.author: passionislife

customer_reviews.title: The bad is the ear pice dosent recoil at time or ...
customer_reviews.text: does what is says, I was interested in the Bose but I noticed if you listen so does everyone else's so I purchased theses because they have ear plugs as well. So not everyone has to listen . The bad is the ear pice dosent recoil at time or its a pain because it takes so long.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Crapped out after 7 months of use
customer_reviews.text: It was decent until it stopped working. The company who sold it to us thru Amazon told us to contact LG about the problem. Not a fan of LG products period. Would never order this one again. Expensive crap.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Good immersive surround sound in a wireless headset.
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit it,I was sceptical at first.How can you achieve true surround sound,in wireless headset.LG did it.This headset was made for movies,and gaming.The surround sound fully immersive.The music play back slightly weak ,minor quibble here.Great quality
customer_reviews.author: david millhouse

customer_reviews.title: You dont gwt the bass as the make it out to be but some decent music is way better than none
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for a little over a week. I totally dig these. You dont gwt the bass as the make it out to be but some decent music is way better than none. I find peeps in the shop gravitating my way because I got the hook up. Lol. Works well with phone, TV, and xbox (with the correct cable)
customer_reviews.author: Hopper Family

customer_reviews.title: better than expected
customer_reviews.text: i was expecting this to be junk. after all i am too cheap to pay $400 for the bose soundwear and hence this. I was surprised. i mean the speakers sound quality isn’t going to win awards but hey it isn’t bad for the price. i wonder if i can buy that boss soundwear cover for this .....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Long battery life
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great, I like the speaker functionality, and it has a long battery life! I use this for podcasts to listen to while working, so I need shows that have a couple hours to them, and it goes through 4+ hours of listening and even an hour break of nothingness, and still has a high battery! Love this headset so glad my friend recommended these to me
customer_reviews.author: Rewind

customer_reviews.title: Great for shops where headphones are not allowed
customer_reviews.text: We use this product in our wood shop where a regular radio needs to be blasted to hear over machinery. This affected our office staff however and drove everyone up front Nuts. Safety issues prohibited us from using headphones so this was the only but perfect solution. We tried 1 out and quickly ordered 3 more for all of the shop guys.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Spend the extra money on a Bose Soundwear
customer_reviews.text: These really sound awful. These are okay for watching TV, but not worthy of listening to music. Spend the extra money for the Bose Soundwear.

Battery tolal use is about 9 hours constantly stream audio that could be better amount of time. Over all it works good. I like it not in love with it. I would buy one as a gift.

customer_reviews.text: Works great for me. Like others have said the bass is weak but I use an app to boost it up a bit. based on how much I paid this was a good deal/

customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband to use while working at his job outside. It's great hands-free when you are up on a ladder on a tall pole. a few of his co-workers were so impressed, the bought the product too. Safety first.

I think the damage was not made from delivery process, but surely from someone had open it already. The product inside is seemed clear but I can't stop feel annoyed.

customer_reviews.title: Poor build quality
customer_reviews.text: Garbage! Sounded ok in speaker mode. Didn't sound that great with earbuds. Other models of tone (Active for example) sound much better. The real problem is with the build quality. The housing flexes and causes some sort of short that makes the Bluetooth drop and the speakers crackle. One if the buttons fell off, and within a couple if weeks both earbuds locked up and wouldn't recoil. It's a neat idea, but definitely not worth the cost.

customer_reviews.title: No compatible 3.5mm cable provided

And their reaction was awesome, they freaked out. It works well with orchestra, symphony or opera music. I will consider buying another one or if they ever make a new model, I'll buy that one.

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite headset
customer_reviews.text: I've had the Tone Infinim (HBS 910) and the Tone Platinum (HBS-1100) and so far these are by far my favorite. Being able to listen to music but still hear everything around me excellent and people around you can't really hear it unless you really turn it up. Earbuds are comfortable (I use the small ones) and the sound is great! My only complaint is that they changed the retraction system from push button, to pull, so just take care and don't yank on them.

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed

customer_reviews.title: My item arrived in a ziplock bag.
customer_reviews.text: My item arrived in a ziplock bag . No box no instructions no nothing and the usb cord is bent almost broken I need someone to contact me
customer_reviews.author: Lakeysha Greene

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic New Concept and Listening Experience
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking forward to these headphones releasing since January, and they were well worth the wait. The sound created (personal surround sound) by the set of 4 external speakers is unlike any other listening experience. The bottom speakers are more for bass vibration than sound. The earbuds are commensurate with other LG Tones I've used. The size is fine for me (6'0, 200), but the unit is almost literally the size of a horseshoe (but flexible in the middle) and weighs just over 4 ounces (compared to about 1.5 ounces of LG Tone Ultra that these replaced. Calls sound good on external speaker (only right side works for calls).
customer_reviews.author: M. Fry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wow the sound surrounds your head like a private concert.
customer_reviews.author: cleveland

customer_reviews.title: not great with loud ambient noise
customer_reviews.text: I tried to get these to listen to on a bike but the external sound is not great. The best bang for you buck if you want something to listen while on a bike is the 910s the 1100s are excellent but nothing beats the 910s on a motorcycle. PS yeah I know I shouldn't listen to headphones on a bike, but I do anyhow.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonNut

customer_reviews.title: Speaker good for TV news and shows but not for music or movies
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, long battery life. I did not actually test, but had using about 4 hours a day for 3 days without charging. Sound quality of the speaker is not good for listening music or watching movie on TV, no bass at all. But for listening to TV news and shows or audio books, it is great. The sound quality of the in ear plugs is good, better than my LG HBS700.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Decent  if you really need neck speakers
customer_reviews.text: Not many options in this category sub 150. These are adequate for what I need them for, however if you are expecting some dramatic sound experience you won't find it with these. The surround works but it's a gimmick, the sound isn't full enough for movies. There is no bass, they decided to replace bass with vibrations on your neck which is a poor substitute. For what it is the sound is clear and gets pretty loud. Headphones are so so I actually feel like a pair of cheap aukeys I got on sale here sound similar. For the price I did expect more but overall they serve my intended purpose.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Don't even try them.
customer_reviews.text: I loved all my other LG products, so, I thought I'd try these. OMG is the sound quality horrible. I have the LG HSB-A100 and the external speakers are excellet so i thought these must be amazing. WRONG. Do yourself a favor and listen to all the reviews of the horrible sound these have. I wish I did.
customer_reviews.author: Tac medic

customer_reviews.title: #1 Headset
customer_reviews.text: I love this headset....it's perfect for my job. I wear these while at work in a postal facility (plant) and they play loud enough for me to hear without having to wear my buds. I love the fact that the speakers are in the rear so they play for my ears only. I the best example I have is that I've only had them for one week and I've allowed about 20 coworkers listen to them...8 of those coworkers ordered a pair of them on the spot thru AMAZON 5 others ordered them the next day. I feel like I can sell these. These are the #1 headsets on the market especially for the price!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Derrick E. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and easy to set up. Now I can listen to the news in peace without having to raise the volume over the noise from the family. I was surprised how easy it is to set up with my LG smart TV, yes, it's most probably smarter than me.
customer_reviews.author: Colin C. Tierney

customer_reviews.title: My personalized sound system
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of PERSONALIZED sound system. Then while my family is sleeping around, I can still listen to music without wearing headset or earpieces, which headset or earpieces really hurt my ears. It gives me more flexibility to move around the house with the bluetooth, which the connection is okay while I am away from my computer desk. Overall, I tried on the product for months and find it good.

customer_reviews.title: Buy them. You will love them.
customer_reviews.text: These things are amazing. The 4 speakers dont have alot of bass but what do you expect from such a small speaker. They are clear and loud. I work in a warehouse and i can hear them perfectly without being all the way up. I dont use the earbuds much but i did test them out. As long as they are sitting right in your ears they are great. Clear and good bass. The battery life for the speakers is 6hrs in the manual but i get well over that. If you download the lg app you can get your messages read to you throught the headset. Dont hesitate to buy these. They are amazing.

customer_reviews.title: neat idea, poor volume
customer_reviews.text: neat idea, poor volume. Like, really really crappy volume with earbuds and no bass at all with the external speakers. Plus they're HUGE. Like, rediculously poking out from under my collar. The old LGs I had were perfect, but I was so tempted to try these. I will say, they're very durable... I've dropped them 100 times taking off my shirt and they have no signs of wear at all.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Just what I had hoped for!
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I use them during my bike ride home. They're exactly what I had expected. I use them during my walks too. Sound quality is great and I can carry on a normal conversation while listening to music
customer_reviews.author: b2

customer_reviews.title: The main thing I like about this funnily enough is the BATTERY LIFE
customer_reviews.text: Ended up using the earbuds more than the speakers. The main thing I like about this funnily enough is the BATTERY LIFE, the battery life is crazy good. I use it hours upon hours every day and have to charge it maybe once every 3 days
customer_reviews.author: Omar

customer_reviews.title: you are going to be disappointed. However
customer_reviews.text: If you're expecting spectacular bass sound, you are going to be disappointed. However, if you want to watch movies from your laptop or videos on your cellphone without having your ears plugged with earbuds, these are awesome! I like being able to hear what's going on around me and dislike earbuds and over-the-ear headphones. These have solved my problem. Thank you LG.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Ourada

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: In ear buds could be louder... as a truck driver the sound traffic drowns out some of the sound from the headset... my previous LG headset was better...
customer_reviews.author: Joyna

customer_reviews.title: These are for casual walking,office,Bed,or lounge use
customer_reviews.text: My dislike would be that they do tend to fall off neck if im not paying attention however i bought these Refurbished and they have been excellent especially for price. Also looked brand new. I wish i owed a flat LG screen to unlock potential but i have played the exterior speakers with cable (awesome) and sounds ok without. Its convenient to even have that option 2 choose from. The earbud option do sound great for bluetooth and helps battery last longer. These have been the longest LG headphones i have ever owned and have to say will easily last a year i hope. My LG Tone Ultra New (not refurbished) from Target wore out in less then 5 months
customer_reviews.author: PAPApotatos

product_meta.title: LG Tone Studio HBS-W120 - Wearable Personal Speaker - Titan Gray
product_meta.description:
Combining portability and immersion with rich volume and theater-quality sound, the LG TONE Studio is a unique, around-the-neck Bluetoothwearable speaker engineered to provide clear personal surround sound and a true sensory experience - perfect for music, gaming, movies, TV shows, phone calls and so much more. Real 3D Surround is delivered through four speakers arranged in ideal positions on the neckband to create the world's first-DTS-tuned sound experience designed for a wearable headset. So no matter where you are, with the Tone Studio on you remain in the surround sound zone. Wearable Bass special vibration speakers allow your body to feel the sound in low-bandwidth, as if you were right there in the heart of the action. It also features premium Hi-Fi DAC and the ability to block out background noise for clearer dialogue, which is a powerful solution for any audiophile or those who may need assistive listening while watching television or on the phone. Plus with the retractable earbuds, you have the choice of using the TONE Studio as a wearable speaker or using the earbuds for a more private audio experience. So sit on the couch or take LG's top-of-the-line wearable on a stroll - wherever you go, you'll remain at the center of your entertainment.

* Talk Time - Up to 40 hrs (Earphone Mode); 16 hrs (Speaker Mode).

* Music Time - Up to 35 hrs (Earphone Mode); Up to 6 hrs (Speaker Mode).

* Standby Time - Up to 61 Days.

* Charging Time - Less than two hours.

* Dimensions - 7.6"(W) X 6.9" (L) X 0.7"(H).
feature_bullets: Personal Surround Experience - combine immersion and portability with the true experience of high quality sound and rich volume.
Real 3D Surround Sound - 4 strategically placed speakers designed to deliver the best in dimensional surround sound.
Haptic User Experience - Wearable Bass maximizes the sense of immersion with special vibration speakers that engage your entire body in low bandwidth.
Sound Designed by DTS - experience the first DTS-tuned wearable wireless device for "cinema-like" surround sound.
Dual Play - connect two LG TONE Studio devices simultaneously to share the sound experience.
